column4: hello everybody, remember me. Now I cannot acces NTFS volumes on my system, what's wrong, why only root can do that
it can only be read by root, i want to change it but it says it read only disk, what changes I need in fstab

you need to install "captive" the NTFS module will only "read" not write or erase because Microsoft has released no or little information on NTFS and yes Microsoft changes NTFS with little or no warning
captive uses your "windows dll files" so it can read write and erase files
